create.name: adidas YEEZY BOOST 350 V2 Semi Frozen Yellow
create.description: The adidas Yeezy Boost 350 v2 is one of the most popular Yeezy shoes ever made. It features an elastic Primeknit upper and a BOOST midsole, while the most recognizable detail is the ribbed midsole. First releasing in September of 2016, the Yeezy Boost 350 v2 has gone on to be the best-selling adidas Yeezy shoe so far, with several colorways having released and restocked to date.
create.short_description: The color is Semi Frozen Yellow. The size is 9 UK - 43 1/3 EU.
